verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Perished be the two hands of Abu Lahab and he is already perished.
verse.verse_2: His wealth and what he earned availed him not.
verse.verse_3: Now he enters into a blazing fire;
verse.verse_4: And his wife too, carrier of firewood.
verse.verse_5: There is a rope of palm fibre in her neck.
